docs.snippet: Multiple bombings struck a government-run checkpoint in the central Syrian city of Homs on Tuesday, killing at least 20 people and wounding over a hundred amid intense political jockeying ahead of U.N.-backed peace talks scheduled to begin in Gene...
docs.lead_paragraph: Multiple bombings struck a government-run checkpoint in the central Syrian city of Homs on Tuesday, killing at least 20 people and wounding over a hundred amid intense political jockeying ahead of U.N.-backed peace talks scheduled to begin in Geneva on Friday.

headline.main: Bombings Kill 20 in Syria as Peace Talks Invitations Go Out
headline.print_headline: Bombings Kill 20 in Syria as Peace Talks Invitations Go Out

docs.snippet: The United Nations invited Syria's government and opposition to peace talks in Geneva on Friday, but Saudi-backed opponents of President Bashar al-Assad have yet to decide whether to drop their objections to taking part....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations invited Syria's government and opposition to peace talks in Geneva on Friday, but Saudi-backed opponents of President Bashar al-Assad have yet to decide whether to drop their objections to taking part.

headline.main: U.N. Invites Warring Parties to Syria Talks This Week
headline.print_headline: U.N. Invites Warring Parties to Syria Talks This Week

docs.snippet: VMware Inc forecast 2016 revenue and profit below analysts' expectations, suggesting the software maker's strong growth in new businesses was not enough to compensate for weakness in its traditional server-virtualization software....
docs.lead_paragraph: VMware Inc forecast 2016 revenue and profit below analysts' expectations, suggesting the software maker's strong growth in new businesses was not enough to compensate for weakness in its traditional server-virtualization software.

headline.main: Software Maker VMware to Cut 800 Jobs, Sees Weak 2016
headline.print_headline: Software Maker VMware to Cut 800 Jobs, Sees Weak 2016

docs.snippet: World athletics chief Sebastian Coe is the right man to lead the sport out of its doping and corruption crisis and he has the support of all the European federations, European Athletics president Svein Arne Hansen said....
docs.lead_paragraph: World athletics chief Sebastian Coe is the right man to lead the sport out of its doping and corruption crisis and he has the support of all the European federations, European Athletics president Svein Arne Hansen said.

headline.main: No Alternative to Coe for IAAF Presidency: Hansen
headline.print_headline: No Alternative to Coe for IAAF Presidency: Hansen

docs.snippet: The envoy, Staffan de Mistura, said the talks in Geneva, aimed at a general cease-fire, would be “uphill” and declined to identify who was invited....
docs.lead_paragraph: The envoy, Staffan de Mistura, said the talks in Geneva, aimed at a general cease-fire, would be “uphill” and declined to identify who was invited.
docs.abstract: United Nations sets new date for Geneva peace talks aimed at resolving conflict in Syria; offers no details on crucial questions of which opposition groups would be invited to table, or about future role of Pres Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: U.N. Envoy for Syria Says Peace Talks Will Begin Friday
headline.print_headline: Delayed Syrian Peace Talks Are Scheduled to Begin on Friday, U.N. Says

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce reported from Geneva, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations. Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.
byline.original: By NICK CUMMING-BRUCE and SOMINI SENGUPTA

docs.snippet: Gov. Nikki Haley on Tuesday moved forward with her threat to sue the U.S. Department of Energy for the agency's failure to meet a Jan. 1 nuclear fuel deadline, asking South Carolina's top prosecutor to pursue litigation and collection of $1 millio...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Nikki Haley on Tuesday moved forward with her threat to sue the U.S. Department of Energy for the agency's failure to meet a Jan. 1 nuclear fuel deadline, asking South Carolina's top prosecutor to pursue litigation and collection of $1 million daily fine.

headline.main: Gov. Haley Asks SC Prosecutor to Sue Feds Over MOX Project
headline.print_headline: Gov. Haley Asks SC Prosecutor to Sue Feds Over MOX Project

docs.lead_paragraph: Denmark's parliament passed measures on Tuesday aimed at deterring refugees from seeking asylum, including confiscating valuables to pay for their stay, despite protests from international human rights organisations.
